thread.section_title: Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Hotel!
thread.title_full: Amazing Hotel! - Review of Hotel Brighton - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lauleavy
title: Amazing Hotel!
text: We stayed as a couple in February and I could not compliment the hotel more! The location was perfection, the room was so classic and inviting and the view was to die for! The view alone made the hotel 5 star in my opinion. The staff were so friendly and helpful! I've been to Paris a number of times and this hotel was by far my favourite, I could not recommend it more and will 100% be returning in the future.
